entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ArmageddonOrksDescription
entry.value: Jopall Indentured Squadrons are 17% more accurate against Orks.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ArmageddonOrksFlavor
entry.value: Facing the Greentide on Armageddon taught the Jopall Indentured Squadrons the best ways to exterminate Orks.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/JopallGloryDescription
entry.value: Jopall Indentured Squadrons gain influence in battle.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/JopallGloryFlavor
entry.value: Each battle comes with an opportunity to repay their debts. The Jopall Indentured Squadrons are infamously greedy, to the point where they'd track and demand payment for every individual kill.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/JopallCityDescription
entry.value: While near allied cities, ignore accuracy loss from movement.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/JopallCityFlavor
entry.value: Troops from Jopall prefer to fight defensively, committing only when necessary. Consequently, they're adept at quickly setting up their weapons to meet an incoming assault.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/MuggingSpoilsDescription
entry.value: This unit generates influence after shaking down an ally.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/MuggingSpoilsFlavor
entry.value: The snakes from Jopall gleefully count their ill-gotten gains, without a care for the troopers they left bruised and bloody.
